### Loading the packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(here)
```

### Reading in the Data

```{r}
data <- read_csv(here("content", "data", "answer_export.csv"))
data
```

### Rename the columns

```{r}
data_clean <- data %>%
  select(content, session_id, question_id) %>%
  rename(Answer = content,
         SID = session_id,
         QID = question_id)
```

### Examining the columns

```{r}
glimpse(data_clean)
str(data)
```
